text: Juan Antonio Garc√≠a Bayona (born 9 May 1975) is a Spanish movie director. He is best known for directing the movies The Orphanage (2007), The Impossible (2012), A Monster Calls (2016) and Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom (2018). He has also directed two episodes of the television series Penny Dreadful. Bayona was born in Barcelona, Catalonia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Barcelona
title: J. A. Bayona
